item.title: [sir] Dusk Feaster
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Delirium — This spell costs {2} less to cast if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

Flying

item.title: [sir] Drunau Corpse Trawler
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Drunau Corpse Trawler enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

{2}{B}: Target Zombie gains deathtouch until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Drownyard Explorers
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Drownyard Explorers enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [sir] Drownyard Behemoth
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Crab

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Emerge {7}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)

Drownyard Behemoth has hexproof as long as it entered the battlefield this turn.

item.title: [sir] Drogskol Shieldmate
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Soldier

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

When Drogskol Shieldmate enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Drag Under
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature to its owner's hand.

Draw a card.

item.title: [sir] Distended Mindbender
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Insect

Emerge {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)

When you cast this spell, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose from it a nonland card with mana value 3 or less and a card with mana value 4 or greater. That player discards those cards.

item.title: [sir] Diregraf Colossus
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Giant

Diregraf Colossus enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card in your graveyard.

Whenever you cast a Zombie spell, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

item.title: [sir] Devilthorn Fox
item.description: Creature — Fox

item.title: [sir] Devils' Playground
item.description:
Sorcery

Create four 1/1 red Devil creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

item.title: [sir] Descend upon the Sinful
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile all creatures.

Delirium — Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [sir] Deranged Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [sir] Deny Existence
item.description:
Instant

Counter target creature spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

item.title: [sir] Declaration in Stone
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target creature and all other creatures its controller controls with the same name as that creature. That player investigates for each nontoken creature exiled this way.

item.title: [sir] Decimator of the Provinces
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi Boar

Emerge {6}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)

When you cast this spell, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

Trample, haste

item.title: [sir] Deathcap Cultivator
item.description:
Creature — Human Druid

{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

Delirium — Deathcap Cultivator has deathtouch as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [sir] Dead Weight
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

item.title: [sir] Dawn Gryff
item.description:
Creature — Hippogriff

Flying

item.title: [sir] Dauntless Cathar
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

{1}{W}, Exile Dauntless Cathar from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [sir] Dark Salvation
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player creates X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, then up to one target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each Zombie that player controls.

item.title: [sir] Cryptolith Rite
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

item.title: [sir] Crow of Dark Tidings
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Bird

Flying

When Crow of Dark Tidings enters the battlefield or dies, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

item.title: [sir] Crawling Sensation
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may mill two cards.

Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

item.title: [sir] Courageous Outrider
item.description:
Creature — Human Scout

When Courageous Outrider enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a Human card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

item.title: [sir] Convolute
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

item.title: [sir] Confront the Unknown
item.description:
Instant

Investigate, then target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Clue you control. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [sir] Confirm Suspicions
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell.

Investigate three times. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [sir] Compelling Deterrence
item.description:
Instant

Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card if you control a Zombie.

item.title: [sir] Collective Effort
item.description:
Sorcery

Escalate—Tap an untapped creature you control. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or more —

• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.

item.title: [sir] Collective Defiance
item.description:
Sorcery

Escalate {1} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or more —

• Target player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards.

• Collective Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature.

• Collective Defiance deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

item.title: [sir] Collective Brutality
item.description:
Sorcery

Escalate—Discard a card. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or more —

• Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it. That player discards that card.

• Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

• Target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [sir] Clear Shot
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

item.title: [sir] Choked Estuary
item.description:
Land

As Choked Estuary enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, Choked Estuary enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

item.title: [sir] Certain Death
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [sir] Call the Bloodline
item.description:
Enchantment

{1}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 black Vampire Knight creature token with lifelink. Activate only once each turn.

item.title: [sir] Byway Courier
item.description:
Creature — Human Scout

When Byway Courier dies, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [sir] Bygone Bishop
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Cleric

Flying

Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 3 or less, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

item.title: [sir] Burn from Within
item.description:
Sorcery

Burn from Within deals X damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it loses indestructible until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

item.title: [sir] Bruna, the Fading Light
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel Horror

When you cast this spell, you may return target Angel or Human creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Flying, vigilance

(Melds with Gisela, the Broken Blade.)

item.title: [sir] Briarbridge Patrol
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever Briarbridge Patrol deals damage to one or more creatures, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

At the beginning of each end step, if you sacrificed three or more Clues this turn, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [sir] Brain in a Jar
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Brain in a Jar, then you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Brain in a Jar from your hand without paying its mana cost.

{3}, {T}, Remove X charge counters from Brain in a Jar: Scry X.

item.title: [sir] Bound by Moonsilver
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack, block, or transform.

Sacrifice another permanent: Attach Bound by Moonsilver to target creature. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

item.title: [sir] Borrowed Malevolence
item.description:
Instant

Escalate {2} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or both —

• Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Borrowed Hostility
item.description:
Instant

Escalate {3} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or both —

• Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

• Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Borrowed Grace
item.description:
Instant

Escalate {1}{W} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or both —

• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

• Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Blood Mist
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [sir] Bloodmad Vampire
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Berserker

Whenever Bloodmad Vampire deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [sir] Bloodhall Priest
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Cleric

Whenever Bloodhall Priest enters the battlefield or attacks, if you have no cards in hand, Bloodhall Priest deals 2 damage to any target.

Madness {1}{B}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [sir] Bloodbriar
item.description:
Creature — Plant Elemental

Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodbriar.

item.title: [sir] Blessed Alliance
item.description:
Instant

Escalate {2} (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or more —

• Target player gains 4 life.

• Untap up to two target creatures.

• Target opponent sacrifices an attacking creature.
